extendedIngredients.original: Such a pretty color! You can also use your mini food processor to make a smaller serving. I used my large one, because I do everything in excess. I know no limits.

extendedIngredients.original: In a food processor, combine garlic, arugula and cheese. Pulse until combined. Stream in olive oil a tablespoon at a time until the pesto becomes smooth.

extendedIngredients.original: It made my hubby full, happy, convulsion-free, and put him right to sleep. Just the way I like it.

title: Arugula and Asiago Pesto
summary: You can never have too many condiment recipes, so give Arugulan and Asiago Pesto a try. For $6.49 per serving, this recipe covers 48% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 3. One serving contains 1641 calories, 81g of protein, and 96g of fat. Head to the store and pick up such a pretty color! you can also use your food processor to make a smaller serving. i used my one, arugulan and asiago pesto, in a food processor, and a few other things to make it today. 24 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 92%. This score is outstanding. Similar recipes are Chicken and Prosciutto Salad with Arugulan and Asiago, Porchetta Sandwich with Balsamic Caramelized Onions, Asiago Cheese and Arugula, and Asiago Pesto Spread.
